content.text:
# Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Lead Performer in a Musical

}}
The Lucille Lortel Award for Outstanding Lead Performer in a Musical is an award presented annually at the Lucille Lortel Awards to honor a performer for excellence in a leading role in an Off-Broadway musical production since 2022, when the acting categories were made gender-neutral.
Marla Mindelle is the only performer to be nominated in the category more than once, with two nominations (winning one).
